Rescue at Muriwai Beach: People plucked from rocks, taken to safety https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/rescue-at-muriwai-beach-people-plucked-from-rocks-taken-to-safety/RVQ6QVOPTFAE3MNEKHTU623UFE/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/rescue-at-muriwai-beach-people-plucked-from-rocks-taken-to-safety/RVQ6QVOPTFAE3MNEKHTU623UFE/ Two people were reportedly stuck on rocks on an Auckland West Coast beach this evening. Child rescued from island in pond in South Auckland: One person rushed to hospital https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/child-rescued-from-island-in-pond-in-south-auckland-one-person-rushed-to-hospital/DRFNIMUE7FHSRPIM2A3BME2ZWY/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/child-rescued-from-island-in-pond-in-south-auckland-one-person-rushed-to-hospital/DRFNIMUE7FHSRPIM2A3BME2ZWY/ Raphael FranksOne person was taken to hospital with moderate injuries. Photo / Hayden Woodward

Auckland Airport baggage handler Kimela Piukana sentenced for methamphetamine scheme https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/crime/corrupt-auckland-airport-baggage-handler-kimela-piukana-sentenced-for-methamphetamine-scheme/BAY3EQM6RZAUVAVOOZBVANBJ7A/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/crime/corrupt-auckland-airport-baggage-handler-kimela-piukana-sentenced-for-methamphetamine-scheme/BAY3EQM6RZAUVAVOOZBVANBJ7A/ Craig KapitanThe organised criminal group wanted to smuggle 500kg of meth through Auckland Airport. Armed police make dramatic arrest on North Shore’s Constellation Drive, seize air rifle https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/armed-police-make-dramatic-arrest-on-north-shores-constellation-drive-seize-air-rifle/A2IU5IIXHRH7VLGQVW3VIYUPEY/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/armed-police-make-dramatic-arrest-on-north-shores-constellation-drive-seize-air-rifle/A2IU5IIXHRH7VLGQVW3VIYUPEY/ Nicholas JonesVideo of the arrest sent to the Herald shows armed police apprehending the men.
